title: Text of a Letter from the President to Certain Congressional Committees – The White House
content:
Statements & Releases			

		National Security & Defense	

Issued on:
October 20, 2020
October 16, 2020Dear Mr. Chairman: (Madam Chairwoman:)In accordance with section 1264 of the National Defense Authorization Act for Fiscal Year 2018 (Public Law 115‑91), as amended, I am transmitting the annual report on the Legal and Policy Frameworks Guiding the United States’ Use of Military Force and Related National Security Operations.Sincerely,DONALD J. TRUMP
